name: Paper Boat Squirt
description:
Remember your childhood glory days when you ran barefoot through the mud to put your paper boat in the first puddle you saw? When you didn't have to worry about adult problems, just don't let your paper boat sink? The Paper Boat come with the goal of giving you nostalgia of this time virtually!

The game has classic paper boats like the ones your dad made for you or you made them yourself. Your only weapon is a plastic straw, but make no mistake! This straw contains very powerful ammunition capable of obliterating its enemies.

You will battle enemies who want to destroy you all the time, so finish them off before that!
